body.p: If an entity participates in a multi‑employer defined benefit plan, unless paragraph 34 applies, it shall:

li.p: account for its proportionate share of the defined benefit obligation, plan assets and cost associated with the plan in the same way as for any other defined benefit plan; and
disclose the information required by paragraphs 135–148 (excluding paragraph 148(d)).
